Highlights of version 1.0.22:
    * MSP: bug fixed: "empty lines in MSP files should be ignored" * Redmine: Redmine Java API v. 1.0.8 is used, tested with Redmine 1.1.3. * JIRA: support for "Cancel" operation during "save tasks" * Many minor UI improvements and bugfixes
